fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If you are killed at night, when the day starts, you may shoot one person before dying.
- If you are killed during the day or hanged, you may shoot one person before dying.
- You block phase progression while shooting, though if you died at night, the chat is still open.
- Your role is publicly revealed when you are about to shoot. Also, you pick your target publicly, in case your target is immune for whatever reason.
- If the host rules that you are intentionally stalling, they may randomize your shot.
